name: Inner Demons (MysteriousDeveloper)
description:
This game was made for the #193 Trijam, whose theme was "Patience!".

Welcome to Inner Demons - you play a character who has, with no other options remaining, decided to fight his Inner Demons(Anxiety, Depression, Laziness) head on in the darkness... 

Steve is aware that his Mental Power can be quantified, and that it grows every day by 5%... He knows that, if he is just patient, his power will reach massive levels.

Sometimes, he comes across Mental Insights on the Battlefield, which increase his Mental Power...

As his Powers reach new levels, he can upgrade himself and weaken his Inner Demons, until they cease to exist in general, but, every time they defeat him, his Mental Power is halved, which can eventually lead to irreversible defeat...

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys to move

Left Click to shoot
